recipesJson.name: Pistachio Cream Puff - JW
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description:
To create the puff I used Biscotti, white cake and honeycomb. The combination really shines through with even a hint of the candied melted sugar glaze with hints of that burned sugar you get on the edges. The white cake has a creamy aspect as though itâ€™s topped with frosting already so I added a little meringue to create a confection sugar topping that has pistachio on top kinnako soy is in there to bend the fake pistachio note into one that gives the illusion of a few pieces of nuts in the frosting. 
I hope you enjoy! ðŸ˜Š
